items.sentence: Tom is telling the truth, I\'m fairly certain.
I don\'t have as much money as you think I do.
I don\'t intend to do what Tom asked me to do.
I don\'t like any of the songs that Tom sings.
Mary isn\'t like the other girls in the class.
I was looking for Tom, but Tom found me first.
I was very tired, so I fell asleep right away.
It would take at least three hours to do that.
Tom wants to see you in his office right away.
That French word has no equivalent in English.
